this_title: Nicolas Noël: La magie de la poussière d'étoile
introduction: In order to reach out to all children of the world, Nicholas Noel, assisted by his friend Grésille, are in the final phase of getting ready. For Nicholas Noel to accomplish his mission in one single night, the elf Nova will help him find the mysterious stardust that makes reindeer fly. Will she succeed? Will Grésille and the elf Flocon be able to get all the presents ready on time for Christmas? Enjoy a great reunion with the genuine Nicholas Noel and Grésille in this beautiful musical movie.
chinese_title: Nicolas Noël: La magie de la poussière d'étoile
